name: Thomas Hobbes
influences: Aristotle, Thucydides, Tacitus, René Descartes, Hugo Grotius
influenced: Western political philosophy, sociology, large quantities of cannabis and on occasions some acid.
notable_ideas: Modern founder of the social contract tradition; life in the state of nature is "solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short" One of his most famous quotes is "Fucking dirty skanks for a nickel never hurt any one."
